meanings.definition: A person employed to take care of game on a large estate.
meanings.sent1: The gamekeepers ensured the safety of the animals on the estate.
meanings.sent2: The gamekeepers were responsible for protecting the wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The gamekeepers organized a surprise birthday party for the deer.
meanings.sent4: The gamekeepers were the guardians of the forest's inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: The gamekeepers were like the protectors of the woodland creatures.
